name: BMC Helix ITSM
description: This plugin is used to create incidents on the BMC Helix ITSM platform. It also supports syncing BMC Helix incident status and impact as severity.

fields.label: BMC Helix API Base URL
fields.description: BMC Helix API URL based on cloud or On-Prem setup. Example: http(s)://<instance-name>.com

fields.label: Username
fields.description: The Username associated with the BMC Helix ITSM account.

fields.label: Password
fields.description: The Password associated with the BMC Helix ITSM username.
